mapper.insert: insert into user (email, nickName, password, place, headImgUrl, gender, coverImgUrl, sign) values (#{email}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{place}, #{headImgUrl}, #{gender}, #{coverImgUrl},#{sign})
mapper.update: update user set nickName = #{nickName}, place = #{place}, headImgUrl = #{headImgUrl}, gender = #{gender}, coverImgUrl = #{coverImgUrl}, sign = #{sign} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select id, email, nickName, password, place, headImgUrl, gender, coverImgUrl, sign from user
